title: GOP-controlled House passes Youngkin tax cut agenda

title: Poll: Donald Trump Boasts Double-Digit Lead in Utah
description: Former President Donald Trump has a double-digit lead in the hypothetical 2024 Republican primary race in Utah, an OH Predictive Insights survey released this week found.
